The bottom line is that GMOs have not been proven safe for human consumption. In the face of mounting evidence of potential harm, the precautionary principle should be applied. GMOs should be removed from the food supply until they can be proven safe through long-term, independent testing. We cannot continue to gamble with the health of the population.
